definitions.definition: The former term referring to Iran in the West.
Persia proper ( Persis ), the land of the ancient Persians , corresponding to modern-day Fars province in southwestern Iran .
Territories corresponding to either of the two Persian Empires ruled by dynasties from Persis , especially the first of the two.

main_definition: ( historical , archaic ) The former term referring to Iran in the West.
secondary_definitions: Persia proper ( Persis ), the land of the ancient Persians , corresponding to modern-day Fars province in southwestern Iran .
( historical , archaic ) Territories corresponding to either of the two Persian Empires ruled by dynasties from Persis , especially the first of the two.
